name: BestJokesForKidsByScaryMommy
0:
”Alexa, open Scary Mommy Jokes”
”Alexa, start Scary Mommy Jokes”
”Alexa, ask Scary Mommy Jokes for a joke”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scary mommy jokes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Here’s a skill that’ll keep the kids cracking up, and give you a few minutes (at least 30!) of free time. Scary Mommy can help Alexa can tell hundreds of kids jokes, from tried-and-true classics to some brand new ones we made up ourselves! So Knock-Knock your way to big laughs, and find out why the kid crossed the playground. (To get to the other slide.) When using the skill, you can say “Alexa, next” to move to the next joke. Or at any point, you can say “Alexa, stop” to exit the skill.
Check out a few of the hundreds of jokes we curated to get your kids rolling with laughter, and to give you a (30 minute) sigh of relief: 

"- What do you call two monkeys sharing an Amazon account?
 - PRIME-mates."

"- Why do ducks have tail feathers?
 - To cover their buttquacks."

"- What kind of music do balloons hate?
 - Pop."
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
